mapper.select: SELECT E.EMP_NAME AS EMP_NAME, E.EMP_NO AS EMP_NO FROM EMPLOYEE E JOIN DEPARTMENT D ON E.DEPT_NO = D.DEPT_NO WHERE D.DEPT_NAME = #{depart}
SELECT C.CATE, NVL(B.NO,0)AS NO, NVL(EMP_NO,0)AS EMP_NO,NVL(AMOUNT,0)AS AMOUNT FROM BENEFIT_CATE C LEFT OUTER JOIN BENEFIT B ON C.NO = B.BENEFIT_CATE WHERE EMP_NO = #{no} OR EMP_NO IS NULL
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BENEFIT (NO, EMP_NO, BENEFIT_CATE, AMOUNT)VALUES(SEQ_BENEFIT_NO.nextval, #{empNo} , (SELECT NO FROM BENEFIT_CATE WHERE CATE LIKE #{cate}) , #{amount})
mapper.select: SELECT NO , TITLE , TO_CHAR(B_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD')AS B_DATE , CONTENT FROM B_INFO ORDER BY NO DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO B_INFO(NO, TITLE , B_DATE, CONTENT)VALUES(SEQ_B_INFO_NO.NEXTVAL , #{title}, #{bdate},#{content})
mapper.select: SELECT NO , TITLE , TO_CHAR(B_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD')AS B_DATE , CONTENT FROM B_INFO WHERE TO_CHAR(B_DATE,'YYYY') = #{year} ORDER BY NO DESC

SELECT B.NO, B.B_INFO_NO, B.EMP_NO , EMP_NAME, DEPT_NAME, B.RATE, B.PAYMENT FROM B_PAYINFO B JOIN (SELECT E.EMP_NAME , EMP_NO , DEPT_NAME , D.DEPT_NO FROM EMPLOYEE E JOIN DEPARTMENT D ON E.DEPT_NO = D.DEPT_NO) E ON B.EMP_NO = E.EMP_NO WHERE B.B_INFO_NO = #{no}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO B_PAYINFO (NO , B_INFO_NO , EMP_NO, RATE, PAYMENT) VALUES (SEQ_B_PAYINFO_NO.NEXTVAL , #{binfoNo} , #{empNo} , #{rate} , #{payment})
mapper.select: SELECT EMP_MONEY * (#{rate}/100) AS PAYMENT FROM EMPLOYEE WHERE EMP_NO = #{empNo}
